availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Stanford, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Pittsylvania County, Virginia native. Married to Lucy Ann Bolwin. Father of Sarah A. Ends, Martha Ends, Lucia A. Ends, Eliza C. Ends, William M. Ends, Mary F. Ends, Margaret E. Ends, Nancy P. Ends, Hiram T. Ends, and Harrison Ends. Farmer in Garrard County, Kentucky in 1850. Resident in Lincoln County, Kentucky in 1860. Enlisted as private in the 4th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) on November 4, 1864 in Lancaster, Kentucky. Mustered out of service in August 17, 1865.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Division 1. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, p. 81. Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0181.
